metadata.Title: CVE-2021-33294 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low.
metadata.Description:
In elfutils 0.183, an infinite loop was found in the function handle_symtab in readelf.c .Which allows attackers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop) via crafted file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-33294` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

debuginfod - 0.186-1build1
elfutils - 0.186-1build1
libasm1 - 0.186-1build1
libdebuginfod-common - 0.186-1build1
libdebuginfod1 - 0.186-1build1
libdw1 - 0.186-1build1
libelf1 - 0.186-1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: elfutils package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.186-1build1').
